```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache = FALSE)
##source('rfr_function.R')
library(ggplot2)
nTimes <- 2
run_su <- TRUE
num_trees <- 96
ML <- 6
entry <-1
line_type <- NA
cores_used <- NA
median_time <- NA
speed_up <- NA
ahmdalNum <- NA
ahmdalAlg <- NA
leg <- theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 12), legend.title=element_blank(), plot.title = element_text(size = 16,  face="bold"), plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12),axis.title.x = element_text(size=12), axis.text.x = element_text(size=12), axis.title.y = element_text(size=12), axis.text.y = element_text(size=12))
```


**********************************************************************
#### Loading the images and labels
**********************************************************************
```{r LoadView, cache = FALSE}
#Size of the labels is 1 whereas everything else is 4
#Open and position the image file
image_block <- file("../../data/ubyte/train-images-idx3-ubyte", "rb")
q <- readBin(image_block, integer(), n=1, endian="big")
num_images <- readBin(image_block, integer(), n=1, endian="big")
num_col <- readBin(image_block, integer(), n=1, endian="big")
num_row <- readBin(image_block, integer(), n=1, endian="big")

#Open and position the label file
label_block = file("../../data/ubyte/train-labels-idx1-ubyte", "rb")
q <- readBin(label_block, integer(), n=1, endian="big")
num_labels <- readBin(label_block, integer(), n=1, endian="big")

X <- readBin(image_block, integer(), n=num_images*num_col*num_row, size=1, signed=FALSE)
X <- matrix(X, ncol=num_col*num_row, byrow=TRUE)

Y <- as.numeric(readBin(label_block, integer(), n=num_labels, size=1, signed=FALSE)+1)

close(image_block)
close(label_block)
gc()
data_size_curr <- (object.size(X)+object.size(Y))/1000000
```

Testing R-Rerf iter10 on growing easy and impossible(random) datasets.  Testing time and memory.

**********************************************************************
#### Speed-up, 10 runs impossible data set, MinParent=6, trees=128, MaxDepth=0, bagging = .20, FUN=makeA, options=ncol(X), Breadth First
Speed-up: testing time reduction as number of cores grows.  
**********************************************************************

```{r speed_upRerf, cache = FALSE}
if(TRUE){
#create impossible dataset
initial_run_entry<-entry
library(rerf)
		for (p in 2:ML){
		q <- 2^(p-1)
		ptm_hold <- NA
		forest_hold <- NA
		for (i in 1:nTimes){
			gc()
			ptm <- proc.time()
			forest <- RerF(X,Y, trees=num_trees, bagging=.3, min.parent=1, max.depth=6, store.oob=TRUE, stratify=TRUE, num.cores=q, seed=sample(1:100000,1))
			ptm_hold[i] <- (proc.time() - ptm)[3]
			forest[i] <- object.size(forest)
		}
		line_type[entry]<-"RerF"
		cores_used[entry] <- q
		median_time[entry]<- median(ptm_hold)
		speed_up[entry]<-2*median_time[initial_run_entry]/median_time[entry]
        entry<-entry+1
	}

q <- 48
ptm_hold <- NA
		forest_hold <- NA
		for (i in 1:nTimes){
			gc()
			ptm <- proc.time()
			forest <- RerF(X,Y, trees=num_trees, bagging=.3, min.parent=1, max.depth=6, store.oob=TRUE, stratify=TRUE, num.cores=q)
			ptm_hold[i] <- (proc.time() - ptm)[3]
			forest[i] <- object.size(forest)
		}
		line_type[entry]<-"RerF"
		cores_used[entry] <- q
		median_time[entry]<- median(ptm_hold)
		speed_up[entry]<-2*median_time[initial_run_entry]/median_time[entry]
        entry<-entry+1

cat("rerf Ah calc") 
currAh <- 0
for(t in 1:(ML-1)){
cat("Amdahl's Number: ", 2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh+1])), "\n")
currAh<- currAh + 1
}
ahmdalNum <- c(ahmdalNum, (2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+3])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+4]))))
ahmdalAlg <- c(ahmdalAlg, "RerF")
cat("training times: ", median_time, "\n")
}
```

```{r speed_up_ideal, cache = FALSE}
initial_run_entry<-entry
base <- 256
for (p in 2:ML){
	q<- 2^(p-1)
	line_type[entry]<-"Ideal"
	cores_used[entry] <- q
	median_time[entry]<- base 
	speed_up[entry]<- q
    entry<-entry+1
    base <- base / 2
}
base <- base*1.5
q<- 48
	line_type[entry]<-"Ideal"
	cores_used[entry] <- q
	median_time[entry]<-2 
	speed_up[entry]<- q
    entry<-entry+1

cat("ideal Ah calc") 
currAh <- 0
for(t in 1:(ML-1)){
cat("Amdahl's Number: ", 2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh+1])), "\n")
currAh<- currAh + 1
}
ahmdalNum <- c(ahmdalNum, (2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+3])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+4]))))
ahmdalAlg <- c(ahmdalAlg, "Ideal")
cat("training times: ", median_time, "\n")
```

```{r speed_upXG, cache = FALSE}
#create impossible dataset
library(xgboost)
initial_run_entry<-entry
num_classes <- length(unique(Y))
train <- apply(X,2,as.numeric)
label <- Y-1
if(run_su){
		for (p in 2:ML){
		q <- 2^(p-1)
		ptm_hold <- NA
		forest_hold <- NA
		for (i in 1:nTimes){
			gc()
			ptm <- proc.time()
            forest <- xgboost(data=train, label=label, objective="multi:softprob",nrounds=num_trees, num_class=num_classes, nthread=q)
			ptm_hold[i] <- (proc.time() - ptm)[3]
		}
		line_type[entry]<-"XGBoost"
		cores_used[entry] <- q
		median_time[entry]<- median(ptm_hold)
		speed_up[entry]<-2*median_time[initial_run_entry]/median_time[entry]
        entry<-entry+1
	}

q <- 48
		ptm_hold <- NA
		forest_hold <- NA
		for (i in 1:nTimes){
			gc()
			ptm <- proc.time()
            forest <- xgboost(data=train, label=label, objective="multi:softprob",nrounds=num_trees,max_depth=30000, num_class=num_classes, nthread=q)
			ptm_hold[i] <- (proc.time() - ptm)[3]
	#		forest[i] <- object.size(forest)
		}
		line_type[entry]<-"XGBoost"
		cores_used[entry] <- q
		median_time[entry]<- median(ptm_hold)
		speed_up[entry]<-2*median_time[initial_run_entry]/median_time[entry]
        entry<-entry+1

cat("xgboost Ah calc") 
currAh <- 0
for(t in 1:(ML-1)){
cat("Amdahl's Number: ", 2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh+1])), "\n")
currAh<- currAh + 1
}
ahmdalNum <- c(ahmdalNum, (2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+3])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+4]))))
ahmdalAlg <- c(ahmdalAlg, "XGBoost")
cat("training times: ", median_time, "\n")
}
```

```{r speed_upRanger, cache = FALSE}
#create impossible dataset
initial_run_entry<-entry
library(ranger)
X <- cbind(X,Y)
colnames(X) <- as.character(1:ncol(X))
gc()
		for (p in 2:ML){
		q <- 2^(p-1)
		ptm_hold <- NA
		forest_hold <- NA
		for (i in 1:nTimes){
			gc()
			ptm <- proc.time()
            forest <- ranger(dependent.variable.name = as.character(ncol(X)), data = X, num.trees = num_trees, num.threads = q, classification=TRUE)
			ptm_hold[i] <- (proc.time() - ptm)[3]
			forest[i] <- object.size(forest)
		}
		line_type[entry]<-"Ranger"
		cores_used[entry] <- q
		median_time[entry]<- median(ptm_hold)
		speed_up[entry]<-2*median_time[initial_run_entry]/median_time[entry]
        entry<-entry+1
	}

		q <- 48
		ptm_hold <- NA
		forest_hold <- NA
		for (i in 1:nTimes){
			gc()
			ptm <- proc.time()
            forest <- ranger(dependent.variable.name = as.character(ncol(X)), data = X, num.trees = num_trees, num.threads = q, classification=TRUE)
			ptm_hold[i] <- (proc.time() - ptm)[3]
			forest[i] <- object.size(forest)
		}
		line_type[entry]<-"Ranger"
		cores_used[entry] <- q
		median_time[entry]<- median(ptm_hold)
		speed_up[entry]<-2*median_time[initial_run_entry]/median_time[entry]
        entry<-entry+1

        cat("ranger Ah calc") 
currAh <- 0
for(t in 1:(ML-1)){
cat("Amdahl's Number: ", 2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+currAh+1])), "\n")
currAh<- currAh + 1
}
ahmdalNum <- c(ahmdalNum, (2-2/((median_time[initial_run_entry+3])/(median_time[initial_run_entry+4]))))
ahmdalAlg <- c(ahmdalAlg, "Ranger")
cat("training times: ", median_time, "\n")
```

```{r speed_up_print, cache = FALSE}

ress1<-data.frame(Line_Type=as.factor(line_type), Cores_Used = cores_used, Time_Sec=median_time, Speed_Up=speed_up)
amCal <- data.frame(Algorithm=as.factor(ahmdalAlg), Anum=ahmdalNum)
save(ress1, file="exp0027.Rdata")
save(amCal, file="exp0027Anum.Rdata")
flush.console()

lab <- labs(title="Forest Algorithm Strong Scaling", x="Number of Cores", y="Relative Performance", subtitle =paste("Dataset Size: MNIST(60000x784)"))
print(ggplot(ress1,aes(x=Cores_Used, y=Speed_Up, group=Line_Type, color=Line_Type))+geom_line()+lab +leg+geom_text(x = 15, y =40 , label =paste("Amdahl Number\nRerF: ",signif(amCal[2,2], digits=2),"\nXGBoost: ", signif(amCal[4,2], digits=2), "\nRanger: ", signif(amCal[5,2],digits=2))))
```
